result: You step in something damp sticky and green.
An angry green mass of ooze lurches towards you.
Within the ooze you notice a disconnected set of eyes locked on to you.
papa blob?
*angry blob*
As you strike the finishing blow, whatever force was keeping the ooze together seems to unravel before you.
A foul smell fills the surrounding area and makes its way into your nose and lungs.
The stench is so overwhelming that you pass out
By the time you wake up there is no evidence of the gruesome battle.
At least the smell is gone

description: Stage 2, player encounters a desert merchant.

result: As you slowly make your way through the desert, you spot a figure under a faded awning.
As you approach, you see a weary merchant sitting on a crate, polishing a collection of trinkets and artifacts.
"Greetings, traveler! Care to browse my wares?" he asks with a hopeful smile.
"But I must warn you, it may cost you your health..."
What do you do with the merchant?

options.text: Sneak a look at the guarded crate

result: The merchant grins. "A fair price."
You feel a sharp sting as he pricks your finger and draws power from you.
You bargain with spirited words.
The merchant nods appreciatively. "A clever deal!"
You feel a slight sting as he pricks your finger and draws a small amount of power from you.
The offended merchant curses at you and throws hot sand in your face!
You lost 2 HP.
You sneak toward the crate.
While the merchant wasn't looking, you managed to grab a strange vial from the crate.
A spring-loaded poison dart strikes you in the arm! You feel unwell...
You feel unwell...
This is stage 2
